verbs.description: if [ARG0: you] [V: want] [ARG1: to buy a tesla] you have until october 15 to make sure you get the full 7 500 federal tax credit for evs tesla customers must order their vehicles by october 15 to guarantee access to the full 7 500 tax credit offered by the us government to electric vehicle buyers according to tesla website ordering by october 15 guarantees delivery by the end of the year the website indicates us government tesla 7 500 us securities and exchange committee federal government of the united states us
